name: Hacker News - Solarish Theme
description: A theme inspired by the Solarized light text editor theme
additional_info:
Some "tweaks" I made...

- Dimmed comments become un-dimmed when hovering over them.
- Comments are limited to 750px wide, as I find it easier to read.
- New users have a "tooltip" showing they're new when hovering over their name.

Besides that it's mostly changes to colors, padding, margin, and font sizes.
